Modifications.Value: The Lich King's attacks completely freeze enemy units stopping them from moving or attacking, and dealing damage to them while frozen. Duration is only 10% effective on heroes.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Lasts 2 seconds on units, dealing 20 damage per second. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Lasts 3 seconds on units, dealing 30 damage per second. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Lasts 4 seconds on units, dealing 40 damage per second. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Lasts 5 seconds on units, dealing 50 damage per second.

The Lich King's attacks apply Frostbite, which deals <A093,DataA1> damage per second, and slows the target enemy's movement by <A093,DataB1,%>% and attack by <A093,DataC1,%>% for <A093,Dur1> (0.3) seconds.
